revised_title: Acoustic Scattering by Elastic Plates: Fluid-Loaded Parallel Plates and Connecting Plate Interactions
tldr: The article investigates the acoustic scattering of sound waves by a finite elastic plate connecting two fluid-loaded parallel plates. The author presents a method to calculate the sound scattered by the connecting plate, considering its interaction with the fluid between the plates. The study provides insights into the behavior of parallel elastic plates and their connections, which are relevant in marine applications.
